name: Vegetarian Sausage Rolls
author: NIAMIAH
summary: A vegetarian version of an Australian staple. Serve with ketchup.
ingredients: 2  meatless patties (such as Morningstar Farms® Grillers®)
directions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Line a baking sheet with parchment paper
Heat vegetable oil in a skillet over medium heat
Add onion and carrot; cook and stir until softened, about 5 minutes
Transfer onion and carrot to a food processor
Chop meatless patties coarsely and add to the food processor
Add egg; pulse several more times
Place puff pastry on a lightly floured surface; roll out slightly
Add 3 rows of meatless patty mixture across the pastry
Cut into 3 sections using a pizza wheel
Press edges of pastry together and roll over to seal
Brush milk over tops of pastry and prick with a fork
Cut rolls into 2-inch pieces using the pizza cutter; arrange on the prepared baking sheet
Bake in the preheated oven until pastry is puffed up and golden brown, about 20 minutes
